Species.Name: Falleen
Species.Description: [H4]Falleen[h4] The Falleen are the indigenous reptilian sentient species of the planet Falleen. [P][B]Physiology:[b] The Falleen are an exotic, cold-blooded reptomammalian species known to be long lived, with life spans averaging 250 years. [P]The sleek symmetry of their features, calculating and cold demeanors, their exotic looks, and their ability to alter their skin pigmentation means that the Falleen are often considered to be among the most aesthetically pleasing beings in the galaxy. In addition to their strikingly beautiful appearance, the Falleen exude pheromones which made them all but irresistible to both sexes. They have small scales all over their bodies, as well as slightly clawed fingers and toes. In addition, the Falleen display prominent facial and spinal ridges, though females tend to have slighter, more subtle growths. [P]The Falleen are semi-aquatic, and are able to hold their breath underwater for a long period of time, leading exobiologists to believe that the Falleen's ancestors were completely aquatic. The appearance of breasts and other mammalian characteristics in Falleen females and males have also led exobiologists to believe that Falleen had a mammal ancestor. [P]They are one of the few species resistant to mind tricks, and had green blood. [P][B]Society:[b] Falleen society is of a feudal nature, with noble houses ruling over the lower classes. The upper echelons of Falleen monarchies are rife with politics and intrigue, but they rarely spill blood over blatant disputes or open warfare. The skin pigmentation of the Falleen change naturally to reflect the mood of the individual; however, the Falleen long ago mastered the ability to change their skin tone at will and use this as something of a covert weapon in their politics, fostering an appearance of calm, for example, when they are really panicking. [P]As a cold-blooded species, the Falleen respect discipline and control, particularly self-control. They tend to shun public displays of emotion, and are very patient. As a result of this attitude, they tend to look down on the more openly passionate, whom they see as lacking self-control. Indeed, the Falleen as a species have a towering sense of superiority which they felt is only right and proper due to their discipline and rigid self-control. They also tend to view Falleen, and not Coruscant, as the civilized and cultural capital of the galaxy. This arrogance make the Falleen something of an isolationist species, and though they are not a rare species, it is rare to find them away from their homeworld. [P]Young Falleen nobles often tour the galaxy for a while to acquire a taste of life away from Falleen. More often than not, though, this merely reinforces the Falleen's biased views and sense of superiority, ensuring that the youth of Falleen never feel the desire to leave home. [P][B]Homeworld:[b] Falleen is a planet in the Mid Rim region and home to the Falleen species. It has jungles, vast plains, and icy mountains. [P][B]Language:[b] Falleen is the native language of the Falleen species from the planet Falleen. [P]Falleens leaving their home planet learn to speak Basic as well.

Option.Name: One Rank in Stealth
Option.Description: Falleen may begin the game with one rank in Charm.

Option.Name: One Rank in Survival
Option.Description: Falleen may begin the game with one rank in Coercion.

Option.Name: Hold Breath
Option.Description: Falleen can hold their breath for a number of rounds equal to 10 times their Brawn rating before they risk drowning.

Option.Name: Pheromones
Option.Description: As an action, Falleen can make a Deception vs Discipline check against 1 target within short range. Each [SUCCESS] deals 1 strain to target. Targets unaffected by atmospheric hazards are immune to this effect.
